root: ^Not very good, there's not many clues here that can give us a lead
^We did confirm the victim was a child, that's when I had a bad feeling about this
^So we reached out to the parents whose child is missing
^One of them confirmed that this is their child
^She was the first one who went missing
^If this keep going on, that missing list will become a dead list
^Here, take her autospy, you might need it
^Thanks cheif, I need to hurry, I don't have much time left
^I know that your son is also missing and as a father, I understand your feeling right now
^We will get to the bottom of this ASAP
^Also be safe out there, it will be a long night
^Thanks chief, I hope I can fine him soon, alive
